text: Chrysanthemums are a genus (Chrysanthemum) of about 30 species of perennial flowering plants in the family Asteraceae, from Asia and northeast Europe. == References and other websites == *Germplasm Resources Information Network: Chrysanthemum *Painting of Chrysanthemums *Chrysanthemum Gardening and care *ICBN: List of conserved genera (scroll down for Chrysanthemum) Category:Flowers Category:Asteraceae
title: Chrysanthemum
